body_html:
@johnknelsonintific IMHO, the error seems not related to python version itself.
LMDB related error might come from the version difference between one used for making pre-built caffe2 and one installed in your system.

I think it would be no problem when installing pre-built package using conda virtual environment.
If you plan to install with pre-built caffe2 within your conda virtual environment. Please specify '-c caffe2' option in conda install command so as to ensure the third party packages are consistent with your caffe2 pre-built. Use caffe2 channel as much as possible in every conda command
e.g.
conda search -c caffe2 lmdb
conda install -c caffe2 lmdb

Please refer to https://pytorch.org/ for commands for various installation methods.

Cheers.

body:
@johnknelsonintific IMHO, the error seems not related to python version itself.
LMDB related error might come from the version difference between one used for making pre-built caffe2 and one installed in your system.

I think it would be no problem when installing pre-built package using conda virtual environment.
If you plan to install with pre-built caffe2 within your conda virtual environment.  Please specify '-c caffe2' option in conda install command so as to ensure the third party packages are consistent with your caffe2 pre-built. Use caffe2 channel as much as possible in every conda command
e.g. 
conda search -c caffe2 lmdb
conda install -c caffe2 lmdb

Please refer to https://pytorch.org/ for commands for various installation methods.

Cheers.
